scripts.say: Th.. there’s no more?! Those materials collected by {namecode:98} from a long time ago are all gone!!
Ahhhh! The bag holding the material is broken! After all, I’ve been using it for such a long time...
Could it have fallen somewhere? Nyaa... That spot seems to be very suspicious...
--- Great timing Commander, nyaa! Help {namecode:98} find something! It's very important to {namecode:98}, hmm it must be in the port area!
If you help {namecode:98} find it all, then {namecode:98} will be very grateful to you Commander!
